# `/stop` Command
Stops the server. This command is for use on a dedicated server only.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Owner</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### Stop server
`/stop`

Stop the server.
